towerModels

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • towerModels.Tower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ITower
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AreaOfEffectTower, RadialTower, RegularTower

    public abstract class Tower
extends java.util.Observable
implements ITower, java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class that describes a generic tower.
    Author:
    Jeffrey Kirman (260493368)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
